casebody.data:
COUNTY OF HUDSON, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
PMK GROUP, INC. and Birdsall Services Group, Defendants,
and
CME Associates Consulting & Municipal Engineers, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Union Paving and Construction Co. Inc., Applied Development Co., Shipyard Associates, Inc., Tams Consultants, Inc., and J.T. Cleary, Inc., Defendants. C-954 September Term 2018
082714 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001543-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
